title: Firefox ESR 31.1 Portable (en-us) [JUHAX69X]
description:
Firefox ESR 31.1 Portable [JUHAX69X]
 
 
ESR stands for "Extended Support Release". ESR is targeted for companies, but
is also free to use for home users. Very stable and reliable version of Firefox.
 
Every time when main release Firefox gets updates, ESR receives also all security
and reliability related updates, but not the latest new features. New features ESR
will apply only once or twice in year. That makes ESR very reliable & stable to use.
Firefox ESR is My favourite choice of browsers. Have used since Firefox version 17.
 
 
Portable: No installation needed. Extract 7-Zip file where ever You want and start using.
 
All settings already done. Ready to run. Only couple little tweaks done.
 
You could run this also from usb stick. ShouldnÃ‚Â´t write nothing to host machine.
 
Fully updateable. It asks, before update (settings = manual).
 
Installed couple of addons, wich improves security and usability. All setted up.
 
 
If You like this upload, please share it with others by seeding. Thank You.
